Hello,
Is it possible to create jobs without using Web User
Interface(WUI).I would like to avoid WUI.I would like
to create jobs from command line only.Is it possible?
Please do let me know asap.I would like to write
seeds.txt by reading Mysql database where i put the
urls to be written into seeds.txt. 

Note: My Requirement is  "seeds.txt" should take
content from Mysql and process by command line not by
WUI.


Thanks in advance
Sudhindra
